price: Na nini kitakacho kujuulisha ni nini hicho Kinacho kuja usiku?
footnotes: Na kitu gani kitakujuvya ukweli wa nyota hii? Ni hiyo inayotoa mwanga wake katika giza.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany
